blog.description: Mibba is a creative writing site designed for authors to share their stories, poems and articles and gain feedback from a growing audience.

title: Of Whispers and Dragons
body:
“There have been some interesting talk among my little birds… They’ve been chirping of a dragon that’s hidden among the lions. Have you heard any such tales yourself, my lady?” Jon Snow/OC

King in the North

Dragonstone.It wasn’t anything like Raenerha had imagined for all those years, but it wasn’t underwhelming, either. In fact, she didn’t quite know how to feel about her ancestral home. It was a castle…

Read more…

summary:
I can’t make a comentar about That. This is just a genial and amazing foreshadow of Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen.
“Targaryen...
body:
I can’t make a comentar about That. This is just a genial and amazing foreshadow of Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen.

“Targaryen alone in the world is the most terrible thing “

Only Targaryen can be basic of power of another Targaryen. Targaryens are always the most strongest with another Targaryen.

1)Viserys Targaryen decided to marriage of Daenerys with Khal Drogo. She became a Khaleesi and her power start grew up after all that. Dany became a leader and learned about be queen.

2) Aemon Targaryen decided and Voted last coin for Jon Snow(Aegon Targaryen) and he became a lord Comander Of Night Watch. He became a leader and his power and success grew and grew up after all this

summary: Jeor Mormont. Comanter of Noghts Watch. After Jon save his life Jeor gifted his family sword to Jon. This is a sword which is...
body:
Parallels between Mormonts and Targaryens is absolutely amazing. This house connects last two Targaryen with amazing detail.

Jeor Mormont. Comanter of Noghts Watch. After Jon save his life Jeor gifted his family sword to Jon. This is a sword which is heritage of Jorah Mormont.who actually is protector of Daenerys Targaryen.

1) Jeor gifted Family sword to Jon. This swor always protect him

2) Jorah met with Daenerys in Vais Dothraki. And after her brothers death.who was actually Targaryen Jorah became protector of Daenerys. Jorah is practically sword of Daenerys.

Practically Dany’s sword became man who is a son of Jon’s mentor and Jon wears sword of Dany’s protector.

3) after Jorah and Jon’s reunion beyond the wal Jorah said to Jon.

It’s served you good. Take it and give your children after you.

Practically House Mormont’s swords <Jorah> and <Longclaw> serves house Targaryen.

blog.name: macncheeseimagines
blog.title: 'Sup
blog.description: I'll eventually get to writing imagines about people I find cute because I'm lonely. Ships are open and encouraged! Updates will be slow.

summary:
Ship #3 (GOT)
Request: "Hiya! I see you also do GoT ships, could you do mine? A male ship please. I'm a 17 year old, 5,11 foot...
body:
Ship #3 (GOT)

Request: “Hiya! I see you also do GoT ships, could you do mine? A male ship please. I’m a 17 year old, 5,11 foot guy with dirty blonde hair. I love the outdoors, nothing physical though, taking walks, reading, music, playing the violin, and naps. Also hugs, too. My friends say I’m smart, independent, stubborn and loyal, a bit cold and moody sometimes though. Thanks ❤️😅”

I ship you with…

Jon Snow!

You and Jon met when he’d returned to Winterfell after the Battle of the Bastards. You’d been the previous Maester’s helper/apprentice, and had been helping him and Sansa settle into Winterfell and help solidify their position. He’d often step outside for walks to clear his head, you did the same - and soon enough it was routine. You’d step, usually before sundown when you wanted to be alone, or when you were nervous or rundown; and you’d walk, play or read, sometimes all three. Then he’d walk out soon after, usually he’d stop and listen to you play or watch you read; you’d catch him and he’d always be smiling when you did. Soon enough, you’d walk out together; alone in the secret corners of godswood you’d both found. You’d talk for ages, until the sun set behind the walls and someone would send guards to search for you. Eventually, he’d worked up the gumption to kiss you, and the night before he left for Dragonstone he brought you up to his room and you’d shared each other fully; muffling his promise to return into your bare neck.

summary: someone needs to make a gif set of Jon Snow based on when Robert tells Cersei in 1x5 that "one” army with "one" leader and "one"...
body:
someone needs to make a gif set of Jon Snow based on when Robert tells Cersei in 1x5 that “one” army with "one” leader and “one” purpose is “stronger” and cant be defeated. 

 i always feel like that whole scene is symbolism for jon going around and trying to make everyone come together to fight the others/white walkers

summary: I know you think that Dany is not a peacetime queen and that she might go out in a blaze of glory saving the world. If that's...
question: I know you think that Dany is not a peacetime queen and that she might go out in a blaze of glory saving the world. If that's true, do you think that the Jonerys romance will happen in the books, or has it just been added for drama? Will Jon take the throne if she dies, as the last Targaryen? And if he does, is there any possibility of him marrying Sansa? If not, what other matches would you see for him?
answer:
Let me take these in order.

1. Yes, I think Jon/Dany is happening in the books, whether or not either of them survive the end of the series. I think they’re instrumental to getting each other to focus on the conflict with the White Walkers - Jon helping Dany to find the right fight, Dany helping Jon find the will to continue. It’s not just drama, it’s character.

2. I think Jon’s endgame options are dead or king, nothing in between. I think dead is more likely, but there’s definitely some vicious irony to be mined in Jon I-want-to-be-a-Stark Snow getting compromise candidate’d onto the Iron Throne/equivalent as a Targaryen. It’s such a miserable ending for him I rather hope it doesn’t happen. Less miserable: him as regent for his and Dany’s child, but again, I doubt either he or Dany survives the series.

3. I, ah, I do not think Jon marries Sansa in any scenario. Regardless of biological relationship, they think of themselves as siblings. The people around them are also quite likely to consider them siblings or as good as, having been raised as such (see also Theon being accused of kinslaying over his apparent murder of Bran and Rickon). Nor do I think either would be in a rush to go back to the traditional “but the Targaryens practiced incest,” again considering that their society is strongly anti-incest. Jon and Sansa were raised together, in the same house, as brother and sister, and that makes a material difference.

4. Wouldn’t have a clue! If Jon by some miracle does survive where Dany does not, I don’t think he’s in either an emotional or political position to marry a not-Dany person for quite some time. In that unlikely scenario, Dany’s not so easily replaced.

summary: Ok so I have a question: Is Jon Snow currently alive in the books? I dont read the books (only watch the show) but there’s been...
question: Ok so I have a question: Is Jon Snow currently alive in the books? I dont read the books (only watch the show) but there’s been so much happening in the show after he is resurrected, but was the last scene of Jon in the book of his mmm dying?
answer: Yes. In his last chapter he was stabbed repeatedly and he died.

reblog.comment: Yes. In his last chapter he was stabbed repeatedly and he died.

trail.content_raw: Yes. In his last chapter he was stabbed repeatedly and he died.
trail.content: Yes. In his last chapter he was stabbed repeatedly and he died.

blog.description: I swore off everyone's favorite hellsite but I'm back. Officially the dancing queen. Will fight to defend Pennsylvania's honour. Header made by @nnymeros, who is pretty mcfreaking cool

tags: i love when characters have to reconsider their relationships with each other
i don't entirely know if that's a trope
summary: Do you know what I really want? I want the show to contrast Arya and Sansa’s reactions to finding out that Jon isn’t their...
body:
Do you know what I really want? I want the show to contrast Arya and Sansa’s reactions to finding out that Jon isn’t their brother. I want a conversation before Jon returns where Bran tells just Sansa and Arya the secret of his birth. Of course Arya, who adores Jon as her brother, who remembers him as her brother, is going to deny that it changes anything. Bran who is basically a robot at this point Curse you D&D! will likely have no reaction at all, or just point out the new situation in his robot voice. 

But Sansa? She has just now developed a relationship with Jon, and the revelation that this man, who she trusts and loves and believes in, is not her brother is going to do one of two things. It will either make her reconsider her faith in Jon, which I’m sure some people think is what will happen. Or, it will make her reconsider her relationship with him. Because if this man, who is brave and gentle and strong, who promised to protect her, who gave her her rightful position as Lady of Winterfell. If this man is not her brother, who is he to her?
